reviewText: Must see for both sexes. As a man I learned things about women from the interviews that many women don't talk about because they think it's sadly unique to only themselves. This was a gift to a woman friend of mine to help her feel better about how she can best achieve orgasms and hopefully share with her man so he can better please her. Too many men think it's all about intercourse in pleasing the female.

My wife and I never get bored with this DVD even after re-watching it together so many times.  This DVD must be included in every one of the public school curricula all over the world regardless of their political systems, religions, or population control policies.

My boyfriend was the one who recommended this movie. He saw it on HBO and said that it really made an impression on him. I had no idea how prudish we are, in this seemingly modern world, when it comes to intimacy. This film is great for men to help them get a better understanding of female sexuality. It is great for women, to help us better understand and embrace our blessed sensual side. I highly recommend that parents watch it to help them understand how to and how NOT to talk to their children about sex.

I definitely enjoyed this video. It gave me quite a bit of insight to women's orgasms. I'm actually very knowledgeable in this area already, but it was nice to see a lot of what I already knew in the video, plus a few things I didn't know. The only "flaw" was that I think more time could have been spent on women talking about the actual techniques they use to bring themselves to orgasm. It's always good to know more in that particular area. ;)
